## SHACL validation
### This mapping shows how to use the SHACL validator action for validating [an excerpt of RDF](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/siotrx/actions/shacl/lcc-dataset.ttl) using a [SHACL shape](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/siotrx/actions/shacl/lcc-shapes.ttl). Note that either the shape and the data are expressed in TURTLE.
